__e: If you're expecting me to give you some... pearl of wisdom, you're out of luck.
I don't know where you're from. But I'll have you know, I am the catch of Point Place. That's true.
You see, I know you're Mama 's pearl
Or tell us where we can find you a fairy queen we'll go and get her...
I don't know what I would have done without you today... you're the real salt of the earth, you know?
Heard you were caught pearl fishing in your red lobster this morning.
Ooh, Haddie was two. She swore to me that she did not stick a little bead up her nose, and the doctor pulled it out and was like, "here's the bead."
When his body was discovered in the desert there was such a bead in his hand.
